General.Name: Om Holdings International Inc
General.Description: OM Holdings International, Inc. provides local on-demand economy technology mobile software for iOS and android smart phones. The company also operates OM Marketplace, an app that offers groceries, housewares, and furniture; supplies lumber products, DIY construction materials, and general contractor products; and provides local courier, last mile package delivery, and ocean and air freight transportation services. It primarily operates in British Virgin Islands and Jamaica. The company was formerly known as Portage Resources Inc. OM Holdings International, Inc. is based in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 1221 Brickell Avenue, Miami, FL, United States, 33131
